message: Let's make a deal! I take $60, you take $40. It's better to settle early, Bob.
Come on, Alice! I think 55-45 is more than fair. The money is losing value, don't be greedy!
The money is losing value fast, Bob. Let's be reasonable, 55-45 is my final offer.
Alice, the money is losing value faster for you than me. I think 57-43 is a good compromise. Don't wait any longer!
This is getting ridiculous, Bob! I'm taking a hit here, but 52-48 is my last offer. Take it or leave it!
